survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Voice Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home voice assistants to understand satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which smart home voice assistant do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common voice assistants. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clear, tappable options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional text input for 'Other'.
